document_data.mainbody: '''Spell domain''' was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like [[cleric]]s with [[spell]]s and powers related to the [[arcane]] and other spells.
document_data.Granted Power: Clerics with this domain had improved concentration and greater mastery over spellcasting.
document_data.Spells: Novice spellcasters were able to use the ''[[mage armor]]'', ''[[silence]]'', and ''[[anyspell]]'' spells. Clerics of some experience could cast ''[[Rary's mnemonic enhancer]]'', ''[[break enchantment]]'', and ''[[greater anyspell]]''. Those that were masters this domain had access to ''[[limited wish]]'', ''[[antimagic field]]'', and ''[[Mordenkainen's disjunction]]''.
